metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9232 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: In libvpx, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing boundscheck. This could lead to remote information disclosure with no additionalexecution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation. Product: AndroidVersions: Android-10Android ID: A-122675483

criterions.comment: libvpx: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
